title: Work done on rock by gravitational force

content.prompt: Rock 1, of mass m, reaches a maximum height hmax after being launched. During the time between the instant rock 1 is launched from height h0 and the instant it returns to height h0, the work done on the rock by the gravitational force is

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
